item.title: Red barriers around some old metal stumps blocking pavement formonths, 26th September
item.description:
Montpellier Grove on the left side heading south. Red barriers have been there months for the sake of 2 small stumps of metal easily removed which have been there for over 10 years as we have lived here nearly 11 years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Grove, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Drainage pipes are damaged, 26th September
item.description:
You attended site today to clear the storm drains on the road. The gentlemen who attended said they were unable to clear the storm drains because the drains are clearly damaged under the road and that the road needs to be dug up and repairs or a replacement of the storm drain made. This is clearly the cause of the ongoing flow of water at road level which has caused multiple large potholes which have a constant supply of water from them. When cars drive through the potholes the whole front of our house is splashed- windows, door, us, pedestrians- you name it! When they were trying to clear the blockage they inadvertently caused our front garden to flood- we now have a lot of silt and this is causing major damp ingress into our house. PLEASE address the underlying issue with the broken storm drains under the road once and for all. This issue is serious!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62C, School Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
